title: Looking for a gold Top Laner for a Competitive team as part of an org
body:
We are looking for a top laner for a team competing in amateur tournaments and leagues.

Must have a working Microphone and be able to use discord for coms. Must be able to practice 3-4 days a week and have weekday availability around 6-7pm Eastern time for practice start.

Add me in game if interested.

Top lane spot has been filled. thank you for the interest
